insert into QNA(QNA_NUMBER, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER) values (#{qnaNumber}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT qna_number, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CNT, QNA_CONTENT, USER_NICKNAME, GRADE_NAME, USER_BELONG, Q.USER_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN WW_USER WU on Q.qna_number = #{qnaNumber} AND Q.USER_NUMBER = WU.USER_NUMBER JOIN GRADE G on WU.USER_GRADE = G.GRADE_NUMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENTOR MT WHERE USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} AND SUB_NUMBER IN ( SELECT QB.SUB_NUMBER FROM QS_BRIDGE QB WHERE QB.QNA_NUMBER = #{qnaNumber})

WHERE U.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}
